https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/44EHG44ygE13HWPBQnxzdOFVaUj.jpg On an isolated ranch in the desert, one man must protect his wife from a secret past that he is now forced to confront. With the sun towering in the sky overhead, the ranch sits beneath the vast blue, isolated amidst the arid terrain, Though life is certainly evident as a house warming party ensues. Broken Path
